answers.answer_content:
push ups. You can vary them. Place your feet on a chair or couch so you're legs are higher than your arms. That will work more your upper chest. Mid chest, regular push ups. Lower chest?? I dont think there is a lower chest. I've studied muscles and anatomy quite a bit and
below your pecs is abdominals. Sit ups and crunches really aren't the best way to go, but you can if you like. 

You can vary your push ups by putting one hand on a block or book and varying the angle/height of your feet relative to your arms.
